Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Blowing snow. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
